subject: College Athletics
Football
Coaches and Managers
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: In 10 seasons at Ohio State, Jim Tressel, with the help of the news media, has cultivated an image as college football’s Mr. Rogers. In reality, Tressel is simply another win-at-all-cost boss.
snippet: In 10 seasons at Ohio State, Jim Tressel, with the help of the news media, has cultivated an image as college football’s Mr. Rogers. In reality, Tressel is simply another win-at-all-cost boss.
